thread.title: EU drafts N.Ireland control, urges faster Brexit talks

title: EU drafts N.Ireland control, urges faster Brexit talks
text:
EU drafts N.Ireland control, urges faster Brexit talks 6:15pm GMT - 01:52 
Northern Irish border controls eclipse trade as a key sticking point in Brexit negotiations as the European Commission publishes its draft withdrawal treaty. David Pollard reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Northern Irish border controls eclipse trade as a key sticking point in Brexit negotiations as the European Commission publishes its draft withdrawal treaty. David Pollard reports.
